mapper.insert: insert into neuedu_shipping ( user_id, receiver_name, receiver_phone, receiver_mobile,receiver_province,receiver_city,receiver_district, receiver_address,receiver_zip,create_time,update_time) VALUES ( #{user_id}, #{receiver_name}, #{receiver_phone}, #{receiver_mobile},#{receiver_province},#{receiver_city},#{receiver_district}, #{receiver_address},#{receiver_zip},now(),null)
mapper.select: select id,user_id, receiver_name, receiver_phone, receiver_mobile,receiver_province,receiver_city,receiver_district, receiver_address,receiver_zip,create_time,update_time from neuedu_shipping where id=#{shippingid}
select count(*) from neuedu_shipping where user_id = #{userid}
